sentences.english: Sprays of liquid nitrogen freeze and kill the abnormal tissue, which sloughs off.
sentences.chinese: 用液氮噴灑冷凍，殺死異常組織，它會脫落。

sentences.english: Vaporizers convert the liquid nitrogen to its gaseous state.
sentences.chinese: 汽化器把液氮轉化成氣態。

sentences.english: Methods: Cryopreservation of rats ovary pieces was accomplished by direct plunging into liquid nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用液氮直投法冷凍大鼠卵巢組織。

sentences.english: Results The curative rate with liquid nitrogen was 94%.
sentences.chinese: 結果接受液氮治療的患兒治癒率爲94%。

sentences.english: At last, the paper deals with the test results of this kind of liquid-nitrogen storage.
sentences.chinese: 最後還對這種液氮存貯器的試驗結果作了分析。

sentences.english: Processes that use nitrogen as a liquid do not require the vaporizers and pressure control manifold.
sentences.chinese: 使用液氮的過程不要求有汽化器和壓力控制管。

sentences.english: Whereas, liquid nitrogen just goes zooming right through.
The liquid-nitrogen exits from the laser head and is returned to the Dewar vessel for recirculation.
sentences.chinese: 在液氮退出的激光頭，並退回循環杜瓦容器。

sentences.english: The sporozoite cells are then purified and preserved in liquid nitrogen to make the vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 然後提純孢子蟲細胞，並保存在液氮中以製備疫苗。

sentences.english: The wires would be encased in liquid-nitrogen filled tubes to keep them cool.
sentences.chinese: 導線會被包在充滿液氮的管道里以保持低溫。

sentences.english: The number of ice crystals generated from lg liquid Nitrogen was determined in a cloud chamber.
sentences.chinese: 該文對液氮成冰效率作了小云室實驗介紹。
